metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4610 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The SRCU code was added in upstream kernel v6.4-rc1 and removed before v6.4. This bug only existed in development kernels. Please see https://lore.kernel.org/all/ZTKVfoQZplpB8rki@casper.infradead.org and https://bugzilla.suse.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1215932 for more information.

notes.Note: sbeattie> this issue likely only affected pre-release versions of the 6.4 kernel.

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
